comment.body: Assembler? If only Linux was coded in assembler. I bet it would be to fast to use it. And it would take years. Hey this might be a way to slow down computer software development. lol

> [sans3](#comment_1_1KkQmWnbZatijrNzgs4qtyyYcAXyEt3qgr): lol. they wanted to make the biggest computer prank on Earth:)

The new open source machine language Linux operating system. lol 
Actually it could be done if it was on a single rom chip that had the code in it. And all computers were made the exact same. Google would do it. lol

> [sans3](#comment_3_1KkQmWnbZatijrNzgs4qtyyYcAXyEt3qgr): That's not stupid, but considering the 46 million lines of code of the linux kernel, it will be necessary for all Google developers to pass out before injecting caffeine into their blood to stand up. And maybe they'll be weeks late:D

My God that sounds like a plan! lol 
(Open Source Machine Language) I wonder how many people would get the joke. lol
